name: Fruitball Breakout
description:
A fruity take on the classic Breakout game!

Features:

  • Juicy pixel art
  • 4 types of unique fruitballs
  • 10 available levels
  • 11 types of blocks to break (well actually 10 because you can't break the metal block lol)

Objective:

Complete the levels by destroying every block and keeping your fruitballs alive!
